title: New: LOUDS – Ways
body:
Philadelphia outfit **LOUDS** seem like a hell of a lot of fun.

From the jovial sound of their debut track, _Ways_, to their heart-warming honesty: “the music’s a lot fresher than our pr skills”, not forgetting the fantastic title of their forthcoming LP, _If More People Bought Art More People Would Buy Art_, they appear to be people who would be the life and soul of any party. That in itself is a pretty fitting description of their music; upbeat yet laid-back summer vibes. Check out Ways below.
